description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

You rush forward, delivering a powerful piledriver, suplex, or other downward smash that sends your foe directly into the ground. Stride up to two times and make a melee or unarmed Strike. Your opponent is off-guard against this strike. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra 2 dice of damage, and the target must make a @Check[type:fortitude|against:limit-dc] save against your Limit Break DC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feat-effects.Item.zVQR737qPkW2iHiu]{Effect: Meteodrive (Effect)}

Critical Success The target suffers a -5-foot penalty to Speed for 1 round.

Success The target suffers a -10-foot penalty to Speed for 1 round.

Failure The target suffers a -20-foot penalty to Speed for 1 round, and the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for a number of rounds equal to your Limit Rank and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
